# konnect_gateway_control_plane_membership (Resource)

GatewayControlPlaneMembership Resource

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "konnect_gateway_control_plane_membership" "my_gatewaycontrolplanemembership" {
  id = "...my_id..."
  members = [
    {
      id = "...my_id..."
    }
  ]
}
```
